application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Instance-Based State Identification for Reinforcement Learning

analytic.title: Instance-Based State Identification for Reinforcement Learning

abstract.p: This paper presents instance-based state identification, an approach to reinforcement learning and hidden state that builds disambiguat-ing amounts of short-term memory on-line, and also learns with an order of magnitude fewer training steps than several previous approaches. Inspired by a key similarity between learning with hidden state and learning in continuous geometrical spaces, this approach uses instance-based (or "memory-based") learning, a method that has worked well in continuous spaces.
